data.message: Haha! How many times have you said I need proof!? Shit is intense, hence all the craziness. Ignorance a bliss. Wishing for a kiss upon the lips to get that quiver between the... Tips haha of my fingers. Brush them lightly across your face. Feel your grace balance mine out. Finally not loving in doubt. Knowing what I'm about. Wanting to shout out your greatness. Constantly listening to your pay list. Hearing your VOICE increases my love. No need to push and shove we're getting together! No one else can even begin to measure close to you. Maybe one day it'll all come true :-* Don't fear me
